name: S.T.A.R.S: Space Time Anomaly Research
description:
Let's do the time warp again! A routine mission in deep space goes horribly wrong. Can you repair your ship and make it out in under a minute? Maybe next time...

Controls:

  • Movement: WASD, gamepad L-stick
  • Interact: Left click, keyboard E, PS4 square/Xbox X
  • Esc/Start for in-game menu

Known Issue:

  • Restarting too quickly after rewinding sometimes causes the "ready" UI to stick
